verses.verse: <S%H2803>Thinkest<s%> thou this to be <S%H4941>right<s%>, that thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, My <S%H6664>righteousness<s%> is more than <S%H410>God's<s%>?
For thou <S%H559>saidst<s%>, What <S%H5532>advantage<s%> will it be unto thee? and, What <S%H3276>profit<s%> shall I have, if I be cleansed from my <S%H2403>sin<s%>? if: or, by it more than by my sin
I will <S%H7725>answer<s%> <S%H4405><s%> thee, and thy <S%H7453>companions<s%> with thee. answer: Heb. return to thee words
<S%H5027>Look<s%> unto the <S%H8064>heavens<s%>, and <S%H7200>see<s%>; and <S%H7789>behold<s%> the <S%H7834>clouds<s%> which are <S%H1361>higher<s%> than thou.
If thou <S%H2398>sinnest<s%>, what <S%H6466>doest<s%> thou against him? or if thy <S%H6588>transgressions<s%> be <S%H7231>multiplied<s%>, what <S%H6213>doest<s%> thou unto him?
If thou be <S%H6663>righteous<s%>, what <S%H5414>givest<s%> thou him? or what <S%H3947>receiveth<s%> he of thine <S%H3027>hand<s%>?
Thy <S%H7562>wickedness<s%> may hurt a <S%H376>man<s%> as thou art; and thy <S%H6666>righteousness<s%> may profit the <S%H1121>son<s%> of <S%H120>man<s%>.

By reason of the <S%H7230>multitude<s%> of <S%H6217>oppressions<s%> they make the oppressed to <S%H2199>cry<s%>: they cry <S%H7768>out<s%> by reason of the <S%H2220>arm<s%> of the <S%H7227>mighty<s%>.
But none <S%H559>saith<s%>, Where is <S%H433>God<s%> my <S%H6213>maker<s%>, who <S%H5414>giveth<s%> <S%H2158>songs<s%> in the <S%H3915>night<s%>;
Who <S%H502>teacheth<s%> us more than the <S%H929>beasts<s%> of the <S%H776>earth<s%>, and maketh us <S%H2449>wiser<s%> than the <S%H5775>fowls<s%> of <S%H8064>heaven<s%>?
There they <S%H6817>cry<s%>, but none giveth <S%H6030>answer<s%>, <S%H6440>because<s%> of the <S%H1347>pride<s%> of evil <S%H7451>men<s%>.
Surely <S%H410>God<s%> will not <S%H8085>hear<s%> <S%H7723>vanity<s%>, neither will the <S%H7706>Almighty<s%> <S%H7789>regard<s%> it.
<S%H637>Although<s%> thou <S%H559>sayest<s%> thou shalt not <S%H7789>see<s%> him, yet <S%H1779>judgment<s%> is <S%H6440>before<s%> him; therefore <S%H2342>trust<s%> thou in him.

But now, because it is not so, he hath <S%H6485>visited<s%> in his <S%H639>anger<s%>; yet he <S%H3045>knoweth<s%> it not in <S%H3966>great<s%> <S%H6580>extremity<s%>: he hath: that is, God hath he knoweth: that is, Job knoweth
